title: AI-Powered Resume Analysis & Job Matching Platform
description: Engineered a dual-portal web platform: an HR dashboard for batch uploading and automated scoring of resumes against JDs, and a student portal for personalized resume health checks.

title: Brain Tumor Classification using IDTNet
tech: Python, TensorFlow, Keras, CNN, Computer Vision
description: Developed a hybrid convolutional model (IDTNet) by integrating Inception modules and DenseNet connections for robust multi-class MRI tumor classification, achieving 98% accuracy.

title: Emotion Detection System using DeepFace
description: Built an automated real-time emotion recognition module leveraging DeepFace for facial expression analysis (happy, sad, angry) in video streams and static images.
